sentence.idiomatic: You are so fat. You should go work out.
How many hours do you work out everyday?
Lately he often goes to the gym to work out.
Don't do strenuous exercise immediately after eating.
I played so fiercely that I need to rest for a bit.
Her leg has been injured before, so she can't dance too strenuously.
I've heard that dancing can tone the body.
Your article is too simple. You'd better embellish it a little.
Your eyebrows are perfect even without shaping them.
She pays a lot of attention to keeping a fine figure.
How does her figure look?
His build is somewhat fat.
The muscles of his back are very developed.
In the future the technology will become even more developed.
This country's economy isn't very developed.
When he is buying things he pays special attention to the quality of the product.
She especially lays stress on the children's education.
When speaking Chinese is it possible to not pay attention to the tones?
She is an expert in hosting programs.
You are an expert with regards to dancing, and I am a layman. You surely dance better than I do.
She really is an expert in choosing diamonds. One look and she knows which are genuine and which are fake.
What a coincidence, running into you here! Do you often come to this gym?

Yeah, I come here almost every day. In the summer I often come here to swim. Now I mainly do strength and endurance exercises like weightlifting and jogging, etc. It seems like you’ve just started working out, is that right?

That’s right. Before, I was too lazy. If I wasn’t sitting in the office, I was sitting at home watching TV. A little while ago, my friend insisted on dragging me to a yoga class. She said the results were especially good, and the exercises weren’t too strenuous.

You should have come earlier! Doing yoga is especially good for girls. It both shapes your figure, as well as relaxes your mood. After doing yoga, have the results been as good as you had imagined they would be?

Simply great! When I started, I felt the movements were especially difficult, but after doing it for a few days I slowly became used to the movements, and liked doing it more and more. Now, if I don’t do it for a few days I just don’t feel right. Hey, your muscles are so developed, is it because you always pay a lot of attention to keeping fit?
Heh heh, you’re flattering me. Actually the main thing is to stick with it. The aerobics classes here are also pretty good. You can give it a try!
Ha! You’re the expert. I can’t go wrong if I listen to you!
